title: Brunei launches sustainable finance roadmap
description: BANDAR SERI BEGAWAN: Minister of Primary Resources and Tourism Dato Seri Setia Dr Abdul Manaf Metussin (pic), who is also the chairman of Brunei Darussalam Central Bank (BDCB) Board of Directors, officiated the launch of the Brunei Darussalam Sustainable Finance Roadmap (SFR) at the Ministry of Fina...

title: Brunei central bank launches sustainable finance roadmap
description:
BANDAR SERI BEGAWAN (Xinhua): Brunei Darussalam Central Bank (BDCB) has launched the nation's Sustainable Finance Roadmap (SFR) themed "A Sustainable and Climate-Resilient Financial Sector."

The SFR, launched on Tuesday, serves as a strategic guide for the financial sector in adopting and integrati...

title: Sultan’s state visit underlines Vietnam-Brunei strategic trust and economic prospects
description:
Vietnam’s Ambassador to Brunei Darussalam Tran Anh Vu

On the occasion of the Sultan Haji Hassanal Bolkiah’s state visit to Vietnam, Vietnamese Ambassador to Brunei Tran Anh Vu spoke with a Voice of Vietnam (VOV) reporter about the significance of the visit and prospects for bilateral economic coope...

title: Sultan’s visit demonstrates Brunei’s high regard for Vietnam: Ambassador
description: Hanoi (VNA) – The upcoming State visit to Vietnam by Sultan Haji Hassanal Bolkiah demonstrates Brunei’s high regard for Vietnam as a reliable partner in the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN), Vietnamese Ambassador to Brunei Tran Anh Vu has told the Vietnam News Agency (VNA)’s correspond...

title: Brunei's largest bank launches mega carnival to boost local entrepreneurship
description:
BANDAR SERI BEGAWAN: Brunei's largest bank, Bank Islam Brunei Darussalam (BIBD), kicked off its mega carnival in the capital Bandar Seri Begawan on Wednesday (Nov 26), marking the start of five days of community celebration, family-friendly activities and support for local entrepreneurs.
